comments.body: So let me get this straight: Some suits tell the protagonists that the island is going to get destroyed by a volcano, so they go to save the dinosaurs. Turns out the suits are assholes who want to weaponize the dinosaurs. Protagonists have stop the madness, along with a benevolent dinosaur sidekick. Oh, and there's another genetically-engineered super dinosaur on the loose.
Usually you've seen the whole movie if you've watched the trailers but this time you've seen the whole of 3 different movies if you've watched the trailers.
I hope this franchise takes inspiration from the apes movies and ends 1000 years in the future with dinosaurs taking their kids to a theme park full of humans. Called homo park.
